title: When We Love
description: Chrissie Taylor received a scholarship to The Christian Academy in Charleston. Vincent almost makes her forget her attraction to flirtatious, suntanned, blonde Johnathan who has most of the girls in school interested in him. To add to this, handsome Vincent's band has signed a record deal with a big producer and will be releasing their first single in the fall. All they need is a girl singer.Amazon Breakthrough Novel Awards Quarter Finalist (Young Adult Category) 2011
author: Lynette Ferreira
